content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is defined by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals sin x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the domain of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction less than x less than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is the solution to <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative 1 fifth"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="sin to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses negative 1 fifth close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open vertical bar sin to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses negative 1 fifth close parentheses close vertical bar"><semantics><mfenced close="|" open="|"><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="sin to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses negative 1 fifth close parentheses plus pi"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="sin to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses negative 1 fifth close parentheses plus 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="sin to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses negative 1 fifth close parentheses plus 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
